com.ojcoleman.ahni.evaluation

Class MinionHandlerCondor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.ojcoleman.ahni.evaluation.MinionHandlerCondor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MinionHandlerCondor
extends java.lang.Thread
    Handles communication with a minion worker in a cluster that is managed by HTCondor. See BulkFitnessFunctionMT.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread
